name: smartschool-tweaks
description: Browser extension for enhancing Smartschool experience

scripts.build: bun build ./src/background.ts ./src/content.ts ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target browser && tailwindcss -i ./src/tailwind.css -o ./styles.css && powershell -Command "Compress-Archive -Path manifest.json, index.html, styles.css, dist, icons -DestinationPath smartschool-tweaks.zip -Force"
